subject: Re: [cc-community] Creative License Conference
body:
Claude Almansi wrote:
> Of course once you worded it this way, I noticed the Adobe logo. And
> then there seems to be another free-rider on the fame of CC:
> http://www.creativelicense.com/ - but their site is such a pretentious
> eyesore that there is even less risk of confusion.

It's not so bad -- I like the puzzle piece.


;-)
